title: New Employee Kim Chul-soo - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Business Management   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Second Chance
author: 오정
description:
In life, people sometimes think a certain way.
 
“If I could have another chance, I would live a different life.”
“If I could go back to the past even for a day, my life would change.”
“If I am given another life, I wouldn’t live like this.”
 
It was my first day of work when I returned.>
